          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">The Adur Carers Project</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Adur Carers Projekt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Projet de Responsables d'Adur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Projeto De Adur Carers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Progetto Adur Carers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πρόγραμμα φροντιστών Adur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Proyecto De Adur Carers</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">This unit will help you to understand how people feel about being carers, and what their main concerns are.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Health and Lifestyle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">carer_concerns</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">carers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">caring_relationship</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Maßeinheit hilft Ihnen, zu verstehen, wie 
Leute über Sein carers fühlen und was ihre Hauptinteressen sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette unité vous aidera à comprendre ce que les 
gens pensent d'être des responsables, et ce que sont leurs soucis 
principaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta unidade ajudar-lhe-á compreender como os 
povos sentem sobre ser carers, e o que seus interesses principais 
são.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa unità li aiuterà a capire come la gente 
ritiene circa essere carers e che cosa le loro preoccupazioni 
principali sono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μονάδα θα σας βοηθήσει για να καταλάβει πώς οι
άνθρωποι αισθάνονται για την ύπαρξη φροντιστές, και τι οι βασικές
ανησυχίες τους είναι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta unidad le ayudará a entender cómo la gente 
se siente sobre ser carers, y cuáles son sus preocupaciones 
principales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesundheit und Lebensstil</string>
